id.description: Unique identifier for the call engagement.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the call engagement was created.

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the call engagement was last updated.

archived.description: Indicates if the call engagement is archived or not.

contacts.description: Contacts associated with the call engagement.

deals.description: Deals associated with the call engagement.

companies.description: Companies associated with the call engagement.

tickets.description: Tickets associated with the call engagement.
